English: At what time do you usually wake up?
At what time do you wake up on workdays?
At what time do you wake up on the weekend?
Who or what wakes you up?

Finnish: Kuinka monta tuntia saat yleensä nukuttua?
English: How many hours of sleep do you usually get?
Do you take medications in the morning?

Finnish: Käytkö aamulla suihkussa? Miksi? Miksi ei?
English: Do you shower in the morning? Why? Why not?
Do you always remember to brush your teeth?

Finnish: Pesetkö hampaat ennen aamiaista vai sen jälkeen?
English: Do you brush your teeth before or after breakfast?
Hungarian: Reggeli előtt vagy után mosod meg a fogaidat?

English: What do you usually eat in the morning?
Do you drink tea or coffee in the morning?

Finnish: Syötkö aamulla puuroa? Miksi? Miksi ei?
English: Do you eat porridge in the morning? Why? Why not?
Hungarian: Szoktál reggel zabkását enni? Miért? Miért nem?

English: Do you eat the same food every morning?
Hungarian: Minden reggel ugyanazt az ételt eszed?

English: Do you read the newspaper in the morning?
Is your morning routine always similar?
Do you exercise or stretch in the morning?
What else do you usually do in the morning?
At what time do you usually leave home?
How do you start your morning?

Finnish: Kuvaile, millainen aamu olisi sinusta täydellinen!
English: Describe what you think would be the perfect morning!
Hungarian: Írd le, milyen lenne számodra a tökéletes reggel!

Finnish: Miksi ihmisellä on hyvä olla aamurutiini?
English: Why is it good for people to have a morning routine?
Hungarian: Miért jó, ha van reggeli rutinja az embernek?

Finnish: Miten jooga voi auttaa heräämään kunnolla?
English: How can yoga help you wake up properly?
Hungarian: Hogyan segíthet a jóga abban, hogy rendesen felébredj?

English: How could you improve your morning routines?

Finnish: Kuinka monta kertaa päivässä peset hampaasi?
English: How many times a day do you brush your teeth?
Hungarian: Naponta hányszor mosod meg a fogaidat?

English: Do you usually get enough sleep?
Do you usually eat healthily enough?
Why is your diet important for your health?
Hungarian: Miért fontos az étrended az egészséged szempontjából?

English: Do you drink enough water during the day?
Hungarian: Iszol elegendő vizet a nap folyamán?

Finnish: Miksi veden juonti on niin tärkeää?
English: Why is drinking water so important?

Finnish: Kuinka monta tuntia vietät istumassa joka päivä?
English: How many hours do you spend sitting down every day?
Do you get enough exercise?
When do you usually exercise?
Is exercise part of your daily routines?
Hungarian: A testmozgás része a napi rutinodnak?

English: How often do you go for a walk / run?
Hungarian: Milyen gyakran mész sétálni vagy futni?

Finnish: Mitä terveellisiä rutiineja voisit lisätä päivääsi?
English: What healthy routines could you add to your day?
Hungarian: Milyen egészséges szokásokat adhatsz hozzá a napodhoz?

English: Do you clean a little every day?

Finnish: Milloin sinulla on tapana siivota kotona?
English: When do you usually clean at home?
Do you make your bed every morning?

Finnish: Pesetkö astiat yleensä heti aterian jälkeen?
English: Do you usually wash the dishes right after the meal?
How are chores divided in your family?
Hungarian: Hogyan oszlanak meg a házimunkák a családodban?

English: Do you go to school or work every day?

Finnish: Mihin aikaan lähdet töihin tai kouluun?
English: At what time do you go to work or school?
Hungarian: Hány órakor indulsz munkába vagy iskolába?

English: At what time do you get off from work / school?
Hungarian: Hány órakor végzel a munkával / iskolával?

English: At what time do you usually get home?

Finnish: Teetkö joka päivä samaa työtä tai samanlaisia tehtäviä?
English: Do you do the same work or similar tasks every day?
Hungarian: Minden nap ugyanazt a munkát vagy hasonló feladatokat végzel?

Finnish: Missä käyt usein koulun tai töiden jälkeen?
English: Where do you often go after school or work?
Hungarian: Hová szoktál menni iskola vagy munka után?

Finnish: Kumpi on sinulle tärkeämpää, työ vai harrastukset?
English: Which is more important to you, work or hobbies?
Hungarian: Számodra mi fontosabb, a munka vagy a hobbik?

Finnish: Miksi työ- ja vapaa-aika on hyvä pitää tasapainossa?
English: Why is it good to keep work and leisure balanced?
Hungarian: Miért jó egyensúlyban tartani a munkát és a szabadidőt?

English: Would you rather be at work more?

Finnish: Miten sovitat työsi ja harrastuksesi yhteen?
English: How do you fit your work and your hobbies together?
Hungarian: Hogyan illeszted össze a munkádat a hobbijaiddal?

English: What do you do daily to relax?

Finnish: Varaatko joka päivä omaa aikaa itsellesi?
English: Do you reserve time for yourself every day?
What do you usually do in the evenings?
Do you watch tv in the evenings? What do you watch?

Finnish: Onko sinulla tapana katsoa päivittäin uutiset?
English: Do you tend to watch the news every day?

Finnish: Kuinka kauan vietät television tai tietokoneen ääressä?
English: How long do you spend in front of the tv or computer?
Hungarian: Mennyi időt töltesz a tévé vagy a számítógép előtt?

English: Do you listen to music every day?
Do you play computer or console games daily?
Hungarian: Minden nap játszol számítógépes vagy konzolos játékokat?

Finnish: Kuinka usein katsot päivän mittaan sosiaalista mediaa?
English: How often do you look at social media during the day?
Hungarian: Milyen gyakran nézel közösségi médiát a nap folyamán?

Finnish: Käytätkö joka päivä Facebookia tai Instagramia?
English: Do you use Facebook or Instagram every day?
Hungarian: Minden nap használod a Facebookot vagy az Instagramot?

English: Do you take pictures daily? Of what?
Do you meet friends every day?
Where do you usually eat lunch?

Finnish: Tuotko töihin tai kouluun omia eväitä?
English: Do you bring your own lunch to work or school?
Hungarian: Viszel magaddal saját ebédet munkába vagy iskolába?

English: What do you usually eat for lunch?
Is your lunch usually healthy?
Do you eat warm food at lunch time?
At what time do you usually eat lunch?
Do you sometimes not eat lunch?
Do you often feel tired after lunch?

Finnish: Kuinka monta ateriaa syöt joka päivä?
English: How many meals do you eat each day?
Do you eat dinner? At what time?
Do you eat snacks? How many?

Finnish: Juotko yleensä paljon kahvia tai teetä?
English: Do you often drink a lot of coffee or tea?
Hungarian: Gyakran iszol sok kávét vagy teát?

English: How many meals do you eat a day?

Finnish: Kenen kanssa sinun on tapana syödä?
English: With whom do you tend to eat?
What kind of eating habits do you have?
At what time do you go to bed?
How quickly do you usually fall asleep?
What do you do before bedtime?
What do you do every evening?
Do you use your mobile phone in bed?
Do you like to stay up in the evenings?

Finnish: Mihin aikaan illasta sinua alkaa väsyttää?
English: At what time of the evening do you start to feel tired?
Hungarian: Hány órakor kezdesz fáradtnak érezni az este folyamán?

Finnish: Mitä teet, jos et saa unta?
English: What do you do if you can't sleep?
Hungarian: Mit csinálsz, ha nem tudsz elaludni?

English: Do you take any medications in the evening?
Are your evening routines important for you?
